text: Location of Levoča District in the Prešov Region Vyšné Repaše is a village and municipality in Levoča District in the Prešov Region of central-eastern Slovakia. ==History== In historical records the village was first mentioned in 1323. ==Geography== The municipality lies at an altitude of 802 metres and covers an area of 9.473 km². It has a population of about 110 people. ==External links== *https://web.archive.org/web/20070513023228/http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html Category:Villages and municipalities in Levoča District
title: Vyšné Repaše
